SELECT JOB_ID, REF_KEY, SENDER, RECEIVER, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, MODIFIER, MODIFY_TIME, EDIFLAG, EDIERRINFO, APPERRINFO, EDISTATUS, EOOR_ORDER_CREATOR, EOOR_ORDER_CREATE_TIME, EOOR_ORDER_MODIFIER, EOOR_VIRTUAL_RETURN, EOOR_LOADING_TYPE_CODE, EOOR_EXPECTED_LOADING_DATE, EOOR_MARKS, EOOR_LOADING_REQ_REMARKS, EOOR_LCL_NUMBER, EOOR_TIME_DIST, EOOR_DIST_INV_ORG_ID, EOOR_RED_ORDER_FLAG, EOOR_SALES_CENTER_ID, EOOR_SALES_CENTER_CODE, EOOR_SALES_CENTER_NAME, EOOR_STORE_TYPE, EOOR_VENDOR_CODE, EOOR_VENDOR_NAME, EOOR_INV_FINANCE_CODE, EOOR_INV_LOGISTICS_CODE, EOOR_IS_SCAN, EOOR_ORIG_ORDER_NUM, EOOR_SOURCE_TYPE, EOOR_SOURCE_SYSTEM, EOOR_ENTITY_ID, EOOR_CUSTOMER_CODE, EOOR_CUSTOMER_NAME, EOOR_DELIVERY_DATE, EOOR_DESCRIPTION, EOOR_BACK_REASON, EOOR_SHIP_INV_CODE, EOOR_SHIP_INV_NAME, EOOR_CONSIGNEE_INV_CODE, EOOR_CONSIGNEE_INV_NAME, EOOR_SHIP_TYPE, EOOR_OPER_TYPE, EOOR_LOAD_VEHICLE_TYPE, EOOR_SHIP_LOCATION, EOOR_SHIP_LOCATION_CODE, EOOR_REQUIRE_SHIP_DATE, EOOR_PICK_FLAG, EOOR_CHANGE_COMPANY_LOCATION, EOOR_CHANGE_COMPANY_ADDRESS, EOOR_BL_DTE, EOOR_CUSTOMER_ORDER_NO, EOOR_SHIPPER_CITY_NAME, EOOR_CONSIGNEE_CITY_NAME, EOOR_VOLUME, EOOR_GROSS_WEIGHT, EOOR_CN_COMPANY_CODE, EOOR_CN_COMPANY_NAME, EOOR_ASN_NUMBER, EOOR_ORDER_DATE, EOOR_BLM, EOOR_DELIVERY_NUMBER, EOOR_TOTAL_QTY, EOOR_TOTAL_NET_WEIGHT, EOOR_SHIP_DATE, EOOR_PLANARRIVAL_DATE, EOOR_CARRIER_CODE, EOOR_CARRIER_NAME, EOOR_SHIP_PROVINCE, EOOR_SHIP_CITY, EOOR_SHIP_AREA, EOOR_SHIP_ADDRESS, EOOR_CONSIGNEE_PROVINCE, EOOR_CONSIGNEE_CITY, EOOR_CONSIGNEE_AREA, EOOR_CONSIGNEE_ADDRESS, EOOR_REQUIRE_DELIVERY_DATE, EOOR_REC_SITE_CODE, EOOR_REC_SITE_NAME, EOOR_SEND_SITE_CODE, EOOR_SEND_SITE_NAME, EOOR_CUSTOMER_CONTACT_NAME, EOOR_CUSTOMER_CONTACT_PHONE, EOOR_ORDER_TIME, EOOR_REQUIRE_CONSIGNEE_TIME_FM, EOOR_REQUIRE_CONSIGNEE_TIME_TO, EOOR_SHIPPER_CONTACT_PHONE, EOOR_CONSIGNEE_CODE, EOOR_CONSIGNEE_NAME, EOOR_CONSIGNEE_CONTACT_NAME, EOOR_CONSIGNEE_CONTACT_PHONE, EOOR_SHIPTO_CITY_CODE, EOOR_SHIPTO_DISTRICT_CODE, EOOR_PAYMENT_POD_FLAG, EOOR_PAYMENT_POD_AMOUNT, EOOR_INVOICE_FLAG, EOOR_INVOICE_TITLE, EOOR_INVOICE_AMOUNT, EOOR_CUSTOMER_ADDR, EOOR_DESPATCH_CODE, EOOR_DESPATCH_NAME, EOOR_DESPATCH_TYPE, EOOR_OUT_3PL, EOOR_PRINT_PRICE, EOOR_CONSIGNEE_REGION_CODE, EOOR_PAYMENT_TYPE, EOOR_IS_PRINT_PRICE, EOOR_BUYER, EOOR_PAYER, EDI_TRANS_ID, ESB_SERIAL_NO, ESB_REQUEST_ID, MESSAGE_TYPE, EOOR_INV_FINANCE_ID, EOOR_ORIG_BLUE_NUM, EOOR_VEHICLE_BRAND_NUM, EOOR_SOURCE_INV_ORG_ID, EOOR_TARGET_INV_ORG_ID, EOOR_FACTORY_CODE, EOOR_SALESMAN_ID, EOOR_DIST_WAREHOUSE_CODE, EOOR_LOADGROUP_ID, EOOR_LOADGROUP_NAME, EOOR_ASSIGN_NO, EOOR_DRIVER, EOOR_DRIVER_PHONE, EOOR_A3_SO_ID, EOOR_REFERENCE_ID, EOOR_MULTI_FLAG, EOOR_CONSIGNEE_LOCATION_ADDR, EOOR_SOURCE_CUSTOMER_CODE, EOOR_SOURCE_CUSTOMER_NAME, EOOR_PRODUCING_AREA_CODE, EOOR_PRODUCING_AREA_NAME, EOOR_CONSIGNEE_LOCATION_CODE, EOOR_CONSIGNEE_LOCATION_NAME, EOOR_SHIPPER_LOCATION_CODE, EOOR_SHIPPER_LOCATION_ADDR, EOOR_SHIPPER_LOCATION_NAME, EOOR_SHIPPER_CONTACT_NAME, EOOR_PURE_TRANSPORT, EOOR_DOC_STATUS, EOOR_REQUIRE_ARRIVE_DATE, EOOR_OU_ID, EOOR_CONSIGNEE_PWH_CODE, EOOR_SHIPPER_PWH_CODE, EOOR_OLD_LOGISTIC_NO, EOOR_CANCEL_FLAG, EOOR_SHIPPER_PWH_NAME, EOOR_CONSIGNEE_PWH_NAME, EOOR_SOURCE_ACCOUNT_CODE, EOOR_OLD_ORDER_NO, EOOR_CONTRACT_CODE, EOOR_INV_FINANCE_NAME, EOOR_CHECKED_STATUS FROM MID_EO_ORDER_B2B WHERE 1=1 <<AND REF_KEY LIKE :refKey>> <<AND SENDER LIKE :sender>> <<AND RECEIVER LIKE :receiver>> <<AND CREATOR LIKE :creator>> AND CREATE_TIME >= :createTimeFrom AND CREATE_TIME <= :createTimeTo+1 <<AND MODIFIER LIKE :modifier>> <<AND MODIFY_TIME > :modifyTimeFrom>> <<AND MODIFY_TIME <= :modifyTimeTo>> <<AND EDIFLAG LIKE :ediflag>> <<AND EDIERRINFO LIKE :edierrinfo>> <<AND APPERRINFO LIKE :apperrinfo>> <<AND EOOR_ORDER_CREATOR LIKE :eoorOrderCreator>> <<AND EOOR_ORDER_CREATE_TIME > :eoorOrderCreateTimeFrom>> <<AND EOOR_ORDER_CREATE_TIME <= :eoorOrderCreateTimeTo>> <<AND EOOR_ORDER_MODIFIER LIKE :eoorOrderModifier>> <<AND EOOR_ORDER_MODIFY_TIME > :eoorOrderModifyTimeFrom>> <<AND EOOR_ORDER_MODIFY_TIME <= :eoorOrderModifyTimeTo>> <<AND EOOR_ORDER_NO LIKE :eoorOrderNo>> <<AND EOOR_LOGISTIC_NO LIKE :eoorLogisticNo>> <<AND EOOR_CUSTOMER_ORDER_NO LIKE :eoorCustomerOrderNo>> <<AND EOOR_ORDER_TYPE_CODE LIKE :eoorOrderTypeCode>> <<AND EOOR_ORDER_TYPE_NAME LIKE :eoorOrderTypeName>> <<AND EOOR_ASSIGN_NO LIKE :eoorAssignNo>> <<AND EOOR_ASN_NUMBER =:eoorAsnNumber>> <<AND EOOR_OLD_LOGISTIC_NO =:eoorOldLogisticNo>>
order by CREATE_TIME desc
